      • readIntListFromFile

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> readIntListFromFile(java.lang.String filename)
                                                             throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                                                                    java.io.IOException
        Reads a list of integers separated by spaces.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file containing the numbers.
        Returns:
        a list of read integers.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - is thrown if a token is not parsable to an integer.
        java.io.IOException - is thrown if the input file is not found.
